content: earth mama was inspired by my dear friend eve who is the quintessential embodiment of an earth goddess spending her day on her organic farm tending the various plants and lovingly raising animals these leg warmers were created to keep legs warm while working with the damp earth of spring or the tall dewy grass of the fall perfect for year-round they can be paired with everything from work boots to heels wear them pulled up for warmth or slouched for a trendy look the ribbing and flared ankle cuffs make them hug the legs while fitting most shapes and sizes repeats of the pattern allows to customize the length and width for those wishing to do so check out my facebook page for deals and other fun things www facebook com/wolfandfaunknits
